title: Evan Sang
text:
Differential Expression in Quiescent and Proliferating Cancer Cells


Utilize cluster computing to process ATAC-seq data from raw reads with PEPATAC pipeline
Conduct gene annotation and differential expression analysis in R


Assessment of Lateral Gene Transfer and Dietary Intake in IBD (slides)


Evaluate relationship between IBD, diet, and LGT in gut metagenomes through network modeling
Review literature for metagenomic datasets and perform data harmonization


Abstract: Perturbed Gut Viral Ecology in Inflammatory Bowel Disease: a Multi-cohort Study

title: Evan Sang
text: I am a current third-year Statistics and Data Science and Computational and Systems Biology double major at UCLA. My research interests include health disparities, disease etiology, and genomics. In the future, I hope to pursue a PhD in Biostatistics.
